duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead clinical development of digital health product concepts and platforms at the intersection of wellness and clinical care.
Analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and health policy to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Provide clinical leadership in designing and developing digital health products for consumers and healthcare settings.
Manage engagement with partner companies and organizations to advance clinical strategy and product innovation.
Develop clinical study documentation, assess clinical validation design feasibility, and provide input on study endpoints and outcome measures.
Communicate effectively with internal and external partners to articulate the clinical vision and value proposition.
Lead and mentor multi-disciplinary teams, providing clinical leadership and expertise in all areas.
Anticipate, prepare for, and communicate problems, risks, and roadblocks effectively.

education_certification.credential: M.D/D.O or equivalent with 3+ years of clinical practice or equivalent combination of education, training, and experience
